name: wpldap - WWW interface to LDAP server
short_description:
WWW interface to LDAP server allows to administer LDAP directory using WWW interface.
It uses certificates a10n, has search, edit, administer capabilities and also anonymous read-only access.
wpLDAP depends on Apache, PHP, OpenLDAP and OpenSSL packages
